title: The infants advocate against the cruel doctrine of those Presbyterians who hold, that the greatest part of dying infants shall be damned : in answer to a book of Mr. Giles Firmin's entituled, Scripture warrant, &c. / by Tho. Grantham.
author: Grantham, Thomas, 1634-1692.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by J.D. for the author,
